Added directory, <a href="command__conquer_generals_2_cancelled.html">Command & Conquer (Generals 2)</a>
changeset 1723745340 6
Thumbnails now retain their aspect ratio and will instead be cropped after resize.
Thumbnails are now generated for tif and webp formats.
Introduced some minor layout changes and fixed an inconsistency with how size was represented on the homepage.
Changed how we count distributions, hence why the figure has dropped (nothing's been removed).
Distributions are listed per distribution, rather than a collection of files (further changes pending).
Reintroduced support for per-collection descriptions.
changeset 1726835577 1
Added directory, <a href="deep_rock_galactic_2020.html">Deep Rock Galactic</a>
changeset 1728246584 3
Fixed links included in the footer.
Fixed title being displayed incorrectly in RSS feed XML.
Fixed sorting by file size or date.
